4.caption_en:
A blank three-column revenue table segmented into Consumers, Producers, and Partner revenues, with rows for Total Number, Access Revenue, Transaction Revenue, Data Revenue, Others Revenue, and Total Revenue; the year columns are labeled "20__". It appears designed for entering annual revenue figures by segment.

{
  "artifact_type": "table",
  "title": "Segmented Revenues Table",
  "columns": [
    "20__",
    "20__",
    "20__"
  ],
  "sections": [
    {
      "section_title": "CONSUMERS REVENUES",
      "rows": [
        "TOTAL NUMBER",
        "ACCESS REVENUE",
        "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
        "DATA REVENUE",
        "OTHERS REVENUE",
        "TOTAL REVENUE"
      ]
    },
    {
      "section_title": "PRODUCERS REVENUES",
      "rows": [
        "TOTAL NUMBER",
        "ACCESS REVENUE",
        "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
        "DATA REVENUE",
        "OTHERS REVENUE",
        "TOTAL REVENUE"
      ]
    },
    {
      "section_title": "PARTNER REVENUES",
      "rows": [
        "TOTAL NUMBER",
        "ACCESS REVENUE",
        "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
        "DATA REVENUE",
        "OTHERS REVENUE",
        "TOTAL REVENUE"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "filled": false,
  "header_notes": "Year columns are placeholders labeled '20__'.",
  "visual_styles": {
    "consumers_header_color": "salmon",
    "producers_header_color": "lime",
    "partner_header_color": "orange",
    "separator_lines": "gray"
  }
}

5.caption_en:
Blank revenue table template with three colored sections labeled "CONSUMERS REVENUES", "PRODUCERS REVENUES", and "PARTNER REVENUES", each containing rows for total number, access, transaction, data, others, and total revenue across three year columns labeled "20__". The table is empty and intended for entering yearly revenue figures.

{
  "artifact_type": "table_template",
  "layout": "three_sections_vertical",
  "columns": ["20__", "20__", "20__"],
  "sections": [
    {
      "title": "CONSUMERS REVENUES",
      "color": "salmon",
      "rows": [
        "TOTAL NUMBER",
        "ACCESS REVENUE",
        "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
        "DATA REVENUE",
        "OTHERS REVENUE",
        "TOTAL REVENUE"
      ]

      "rows": [
        "TOTAL NUMBER",
        "ACCESS REVENUE",

        "OTHERS REVENUE",
        "TOTAL REVENUE"
      ]
    },
    {
      "title": "PARTNER REVENUES",
      "color": "orange",
      "rows": [
        "TOTAL NUMBER",
        "ACCESS REVENUE",
        "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
        "DATA REVENUE",

        "TOTAL REVENUE"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "filled": false,
  "notes": "Three-year columns marked as '20__'; cells are blank for numeric entry."
}
